title: Unspeakable
description: In this Dateline classic, a couple's anniversary celebration ends in murder, in what appears to be a home invasion. Yet, investigators think the suspect might be much closer to the victim. Will justice be delivered or denied? Dennis Murphy reports. Originally aired on NBC on January 19, 2018.
author: nbcnews.podcasts@gmail.com (NBC News)
